steps.plaintext: Find the treasure chests of Pictures 1 to 8 in the Mysterious Clipboard.
steps.markdown: Find the treasure chests of Pictures 1 to 8 in the ◀Mysterious Clipboard▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Aranyaka_(Gadget)#Mysterious_Clipboard▷.

substeps.plaintext: Some chests are in areas that are unlocked by Agnihotra Sutra, Vimana Agama, and Varuna Gatha.
substeps.markdown: Some chests are in areas that are unlocked by ◀Agnihotra Sutra▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Agnihotra_Sutra▷, ◀Vimana Agama▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Vimana_Agama▷, and ◀Varuna Gatha▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Varuna_Gatha▷.

steps.plaintext: Complete the hidden exploration objective Seed from the Valley of Life in The Chasm: Underground Mines. This completes Picture 10.
steps.markdown: Complete the hidden exploration objective ◀Seed from the Valley of Life▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Seed_from_the_Valley_of_Life▷ in ◀The Chasm: Underground Mines▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Chasm:_Underground_Mines▷. This completes Picture 10.
